document_data.name: Kazook Pickshine
document_data.mainbody: '''Kazook Pickshine''' was a notorious  [[deep gnome]] [[alchemist]] in [[Blingdenstone]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Kazook helped create the ''[[spell gem]]s'' used in the city's defense.
document_data.History: In [[Mantol-Derith]], Kazook met the [[duergar]] merchant [[Werz Saltbaron]] and the two started a gem business behind their superiors' backs.
